text: Boris Hybner (August 5, 1941 — April 2, 2016) was a Czech actor and mime artist. In 2010, Hybner won the Thalia Award. He was known for his movies Jára Cimrman Lying, Sleeping (1983), Dissolved and Effused (1985), Cosy Dens (1999), I'm All Good (2008), Toys in the Attic (2009) and in Marguerite (2015). Hybner died on April 2, 2016 in Prague at the age of 74 from an illness. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1941 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Czech movie actors Category:Czech television actors Category:Disease-related deaths in the Czech Republic
title: Boris Hybner
